# F7047-230004-B Ice Retention Boom Operations on the St. Lawrence

## General Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4191490715-Doc4521910608
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-14T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-05-10

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) is issuing a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, a Fisheries and Oceans Canada agency. This RFP cancels and supersedes previous solicitation WS4191490715 dated December 22, 2023 with a closing of February 20, 2024 at 2:00 PM.

## Tender Details

The required services include ice retention boom operation services on the St. Lawrence River. Interested parties must submit their proposals to the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) by the specified closing date and time.

## Regional Requirements

* **Region of Opportunity**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## CETA/FTAs and GPA

This RFP is open to Prospective Bidders who are qualified under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## Notice URL and Contact Information

* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19387971?extsite=MTkzODc5NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19387971?extsite=MTkzODc5NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Contact Name and Email**: Kaveh Mirfatahi (SPAC/PSPC) - kaveh.mirfatahi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price.

**Limited Tendering Reason**: None.

Please review the solicitation documents for additional information.
